verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> was Jesus <S%G2424><s%> led <S%G321><s%> up of the spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>
And when he had fasted <S%G3522><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and forty <S%G5062><s%> nights, <S%G3571><s%> he was afterward <S%G5305><s%> an hungered. <S%G3983><s%>

And when the tempter <S%G3985><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, he said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> command <S%G2036><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> be made <S%G1096><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> It is written, <S%G1125><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> shall not live <S%G2198><s%> by bread <S%G740><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> but by every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> takes <S%G3880><s%> him up into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and sets <S%G2476><s%> him on <S%G1909><s%> a pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> you be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> down: <S%G2736><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He shall give his angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you: and in their hands <S%G5495><s%> they shall bear <S%G142><s%> you up, lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G3379><s%> you dash <S%G4350><s%> your foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, It is written <S%G1125><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> You shall not tempt <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God. <S%G2316><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> takes <S%G3880><s%> him up into <S%G1519><s%> an exceeding <S%G3029><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and shows <S%G1166><s%> him all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and the glory <S%G1391><s%> of them;

And said <S%G3004><s%> to him, All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things will I give <S%G1325><s%> you, if <S%G1437><s%> you will fall <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> me.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to him, Get <S%G5217><s%> you hence, <S%G5217><s%> Satan: <S%G4567><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> You shall worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God, <S%G2316><s%> and him only <S%G3441><s%> shall you serve. <S%G3000><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> leaves <S%G863><s%> him, and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and ministered <S%G1247><s%> to him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> was cast <S%G3860><s%> into prison, <S%G3860><s%> he departed <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%>

And leaving <S%G2641><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and dwelled <S%G2730><s%> in Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is on the sea <S%G3864><s%> coast, <S%G3864><s%> in the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Zabulon <S%G2194><s%> and Nephthalim: <S%G3508><s%>
That it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

The land <S%G1093><s%> of Zabulon, <S%G2194><s%> and the land <S%G1093><s%> of Nephthalim, <S%G3508><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> of the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%>

The people <S%G2992><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in darkness <S%G4655><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> light; <S%G5457><s%> and to them which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in the region <S%G5561><s%> and shadow <S%G4639><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> is sprung <S%G393><s%> up.

From that time <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to preach, <S%G2784><s%> and to say, <S%G3004><s%> Repent: <S%G3340><s%> for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at <S%G1448><s%> hand. <S%G1448><s%>

And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> by the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and Andrew <S%G406><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea: <S%G2281><s%> for they were fishers. <S%G231><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G3694><s%> me, and I will make <S%G4160><s%> you fishers <S%G231><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And they straightway <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> their nets, <S%G1350><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And going <S%G4260><s%> on from there, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> other <S%G243><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> in a ship <S%G4143><s%> with Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> their father, <S%G3962><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> their nets; <S%G1350><s%> and he called <S%G2564><s%> them.
And they immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the ship <S%G4143><s%> and their father, <S%G3962><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> manner of sickness <S%G3554><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> manner of disease <S%G3119><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

And his fame <S%G189><s%> went <S%G565><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Syria: <S%G4947><s%> and they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him all <S%G3956><s%> sick <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> people that were taken <S%G4912><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> and torments, <S%G931><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> which were possessed <S%G1139><s%> with devils, <S%G1139><s%> and those which were lunatic, <S%G4583><s%> and those that had the palsy; <S%G3885><s%> and he healed <S%G2323><s%> them.

And there followed <S%G190><s%> him great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> of people from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and from Decapolis, <S%G1179><s%> and from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and from Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and from beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>
